mapper.select: select to_char(checkin, 'MM') as CHECKIN, sum(reservation.reserve_price) as PRICE from reservation, lodgment where reservation.lodgment_no = 'LOD1' and '2018' = TO_CHAR(CHECKIN, 'YYYY') group by to_char(checkin, 'MM') order by CHECKIN

select room.room_name as roomName, count(*) as reservationNum, sum(reservation.reserve_price) as totalPrice from lodgment, reservation, room where to_char(checkin, 'YYYY-MM') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM') and lodgment.lodgment_no = reservation.lodgment_no and lodgment.lodgment_no = 'LOD1' and room.room_no = reservation.room_no group by room.room_name
